info.title: [Cortex]: Category and Subcategory service APIs
info.description: API for managing categories and subcategories with full CRUD operations.

post.description: Creates a new category with slug, label, description, creator info, and optional metadata.

get.description: Retrieves a list of categories with optional filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

get.description: Retrieves a specific category by its UUID.

put.description: Updates an existing category by slug.

delete.description: Soft deletes a category by ID.

post.description: Creates a new subcategory with slug, name, description, creator info, parent category UUID, and optional metadata.

get.description: Retrieves a list of subcategories for a specific parent category with optional filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parent_uuid or missing parameter

get.summary: Get subcategory by ID or UUID
get.description: Retrieves a specific subcategory by its ID (integer) or UUID (string).

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID format or category is not a subcategory

put.description: Updates an existing subcategory by UUID.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or ID format

delete.description: Soft deletes a subcategory by UUID.
